    • Constructor Detail

      • SpiderWeb

        public SpiderWeb​(int strands,
                 int radio)
        Constructor for objects of class SpiderWeb

      • SpiderWeb

        public SpiderWeb​(int strands,
                 int favorite,
                 int[][] bridges)
        Constructor for creating a SpiderWeb object.
        Parameters:
        strands - The total number of strands in the spider web.
        favorite - The index of the spider's favorite spot on the web.
        bridges - A 2D array representing the connections between spots on the web. Each element is an array of two integers representing the indices of the spots connected by a bridge.

        Parameters:
        percentage - , the expansion factor.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • addBridge

        public void addBridge​(java.lang.String color,
                      int distance,
                      int firstStrand)
        Add a bridge to the web
        Parameters:
        color - The color of the bridge. Valid colors are "red", "black", "blue", "yellow", "green", "magenta", "gray", "orange", "purple", "brown", "cyan", "darkgreen", "aquamarine", "lavender" and "salmon"
        distance - the distance from the center to the bridge
        firstStrand - the strand where the bridge begin

      • addBridge

        public void addBridge​(java.lang.String type,
                      java.lang.String color,
                      int distance,
                      int firstStrand)
        Add a bridge of a specific type to the web
        Parameters:
        type - the type of the bridge. Valid tipes are "normal", "fixed", "transformer", "weak" and "mobile"
        color - The color of the bridge. Valid colors are "red", "black", "blue", "yellow", "green", "magenta", "gray", "orange", "purple", "brown", "cyan", "darkgreen", "aquamarine", "lavender" and "salmon"
        distance - the distance from the center to the bridge
        firstStrand - the strand where the bridge begin

      • relocateBridge

        public void relocateBridge​(java.lang.String color,
                           int distance)
        Change the distance of the bridge
        Parameters:
        color - The color of the bridge. Valid colors are "red", "black", "blue", "yellow", "green", "magenta", "gray", "orange", "purple", "brown", "cyan", "darkgreen", "aquamarine", "lavender" and "salmon"
        distance - the new distance from the center to the bridge

      • delBridge

        public void delBridge​(java.lang.String color)

        Parameters:

        strand - where the spot is locate

      • addSpot

        public void addSpot​(java.lang.String type,
                    java.lang.String color,
                    int strand)
        Add a spot of a specific type to the web
        Parameters:
        type - the type of the spot. Valid tipes are "killer" and "bouncy"
        color - The color of the spot. Valid colors are "red", "black", "blue", "yellow", "green", "magenta", "gray", "orange", "purple", "brown", "cyan", "darkgreen", "aquamarine", "lavender" and "salmon"
        strand - where the spot is locate
